mcq.statement: Which sentence correctly uses the subjunctive mood? If I am you, I would take the job., If I was you, I would take the job., If I were you, I would take the job., If I would be you, I take the job

options.a: If I am you, I would take the job.
options.b: If I was you, I would take the job.
options.c: If I were you, I would take the job.
